Ade is 26 years old and married with six children. With four children in school, Ade works very hard to provide for them.

Ade runs a pearl-vending business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy assorted pearls and other materials for making accessories to sell.

Ade has been in this business for 10 years.

In the future Ade would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: To buy assorted pearls and other materials for making accessories to sell

loans.name: Abdurasul

texts.ru: Абдурасул проживает в районе Кумсангир. Ему 37 лет. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Абдурасул три года как открыл магазин, где работает продавцом. Он в основном занимается торговлей кондитерских изделий. Кредит берет для увеличения товарооборота.
texts.en: Abdurasul lives in the region of Qumsangir. He is 37 years old, married and has five children. Abdurasul has opened his store three years ago where he works as a sales person. He mainly sells confectionery products. He is taking out the loan to increase circulation of goods.

loans.use: to buy candy, waffles, chocolate and cookies.

loans.name: Lolahon

texts.ru: Лолахон 1972 года рождения , замужем  имеет 2 детей. Она получает кредит в первые. Её муж работает на стройке разнорабочим, работа сезонная.Кроме своей работы ее муж занимается разведением скота, поэтому его жена помогает мужу в этом.На полученный кредит они хотят купить корм для скота чтобы откормить их и продать по дороже.Лолахон мечтает чтобы ее дети учились в хороших учебных заведениях и жили в достатке.Лолахон и ее муж стараются делать все чтобы осуществить свою мечту.
texts.en: Lolahon was born in 1972. She is married and has 2 children. This is her first loan. Lolahon's husband has seasonal employment as a construction-site labourer. In addition to his job, Lolahon's husband also raises livestock with help from his wife. Using this loan, they would like to purchase fodder for their animals in order to fatten them and resell them at a profit. Lolahon dreams that her children will be educated at good schools and will live comfortably. She and her husband are trying to do everything possible to make this dream come true.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Vicenta

texts.en:
Vicenta is married and has 2 children, one of whom is in school. She is 25 years old, and is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Vicenta has an abaca weaving business in the Philippines.  She requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy abaca for her business. Vicenta has been in this business for 9 years. In the future, Vicenta would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy abaca for her business.

loans.name: Ma. Genelyn

texts.en:
Ma. Genelyn is 39 years old with five children with ages ranging from 5 to 17. She is a widow and does her best to take care of her children.

Ma. Genelyn sells "puto kutsinta" (sweet steamed rice cake), coconut candies, and puto cheese. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan to purchase flour, sugar, and coconuts. She hopes to have a better income that would enable her to send all her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase flour, sugar, and coconuts

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.en:
Felicitas is 64 years old.  She is married and has 5 children.  Felicitas is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Felicitas requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Felicitas has been raising pigs for 12 years now, and has borrowed 11 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.  In the future, Felicitas would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Nerissa

texts.en:
Nerissa is married and has 3 children, all of whom are in school. Nerissa is 49 years old and is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Nerissa has a public transportation business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 29,000 loan through NWTF to buy new equipment and to repair her vehicle. She has been in this business for 11 years. Nerissa would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy new equipment and to repair her PUJ transport.

loans.name: Agnes Silverio

texts.en:
As a married mother of seven children, Agnes works hard to support her family.  She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from rice retailing.  Agnes is borrowing PHP 22,000 through NWTF to buy more stock to sell in her general store.

Agnes has been sustaining her business activities through her past 14 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business  and to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Annabelle

texts.en:
Annabelle is 41 years old, married, and has three children. She works hard to provide for her family. Annabelle runs a general store in the Philippines. She has requested a 29,500 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more inventory to sell.

Annabelle has borrowed and paid eight loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 21 years and also earns an income from gasoline retail and a restaurant. Annabelle aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase more inventory to sell

loans.name: Amaraa Nyamjav

texts.en:
Mr.Amaraa, 36, is a taxi driver and lives with his wife and his 3 children in a ger, a Mongolian traditional nomadic tent, which is in the slum district of the city. For 2 years he has been running his business, and daily earnings are dependent on his job requests.
 
Lately, his main car has become unfit for taxi service. Last month, core parts, such as the gear box and engine, broke down.  Also, its outside body has become bad. Therefore, he decided to take a loan to purchase some necessary spare parts for his car repair.

loans.use: To purchase some necessary spare parts for his car repair.

loans.name: Merly

texts.en:
Merly is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business selling brooms in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF to purchase more materials for making brooms for her broom-selling business.

Merly has been in this business for 21 years. Merly earns more income from pig-fattening.

Merly has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To purchase more materials for making brooms

loans.name: Susana Oja

texts.en:
Susana is 67 years old and widowed with five children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Susana runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock of goods to sell.

Susana has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items such as soap, shampoo, eggs, milk, sugar, canned goods, etc.

In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase additional stock of goods to sell

loans.name: Nimfa Colongon

texts.en:
As a married parent of 2 children, Nimfa works hard to support her family.

She has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store and gasoline retail. Nimfa is borrowing PHP 17,000 through NWTF to purchase spare parts for maintenance of her motorcycle.

Nimfa has been sustaining her business activities through her past 3 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase spare parts for maintenance of her motorcycle

loans.name: Asha

texts.en:
Asha is a 25-year-old married woman. She has 3 children between the ages of 1 and 3.  Two are enrolled in school. Her husband's name is Juma and he works as a businessman. Asha operates a food stall and sells her goods from home. She's worked in this business for 6 years. Her primary challenge is seasonality, and her highest monthly expenses are food and school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water.

Asha will use the Kes 20,000 loan to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour and sugar. Asha aspires to establish another business in the future. She joined Yehu to access funds to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour and sugar.

loans.name: Jefferson Estalin Arteaga Calero

texts.es:
JEFFERSON ESTALIN tiene 23 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con los padres en Ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

 JEFFERSON ESTALIN se dedica a ala agricultura a la siembra de maíz, Solicita el dinero para poder pagar mano de obra, comprar insumos, fertilizantes, urea, líquidos para la maleza.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá pagar a la gente y comprar los insumos.

Las compras lo hará en ventanas. El sueño es poder comprar una finca y sembrar cacao y madera.
El desafío al que se enfrenta es el mal clima. En el tiempo libre le gusta asistir a la iglesia.
texts.en:
JEFFERSON ESTALIN is 23 years old. He is single and has no children. He lives with his parents in Ventanas, in Los Ríos province.

JEFFERSON ESTALIN works in agriculture, planting corn. He is requesting the funds to pay for labor and to buy supplies, fertilizers, urea and weedkillers. 

With the help of the loan he will be able to pay the workers and buy these supplies. 

He will make his purchases in Ventanas. His dream is to be able to buy a farm and grow cacao and timber. 

The challenge he is confronting is the bad weather. In his free time, he likes to go to church.

loans.use: to pay for labor and buy supplies, fertilizers, urea and weedkillers.

loans.name: Devorah Mae

texts.en:
Devorah Mae is unmarried and has three children. Devorah Mae is 21 years old, and resides at Kahayagan West, Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. Devorah Mae does gardening to support their basic needs.  She has been in this business for three years. Each month, she earns PHP5,000 doing this type of business. 

She requested a loan of PHP10,000 to purchase fertilizer.  Recently, Devorah Mae joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Devorah Mae wants to make improvements to her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer

location.town: Kahayagan West, Aurora Zamboanga Del Sur

loans.name: Mbodze

texts.en: Mbodze is a married woman. She has 3 children, all of whom are enrolled in school. Her husband works as a businessman. Mbodze operates a food stall business and sells her goods from home. She's worked in this business for 5 years. Her primary customers are neighbours and passersby and her highest monthly expense is food. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Mbodze will use the Kes 40,000 loan to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour and sugar. Mbodze aspires to establish a wholesale business in the future. She joined Yehu to access funds to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour and sugar.

loans.name: Kwekwe Kidanga

texts.en: Kwekwe is a married woman. She has 4 children. Kwekwe operates a retail shop and sells her goods from home. She's worked in this business for 5 years. Her primary customers are neighbours, and her highest monthly expense is food. She owns a house that has piped water but no electricity. Kwekwe will use the Kes 40,000 loan to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour and sugar. Kwekwe aspires to establish a wholesale business in the future. She joined Yehu to access funds to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour and sugar.

loans.name: Vicky

texts.en: Vicky is taking out another Kiva loan of KES 40,000 to boost her goat business. With the loan, she wants to purchase goats for sale. She dreams of expanding her business in the future and providing better education to her children who attend school. Since the previous loan, she has been able to meet family needs.

loans.use: To purchase more goats to resell

loans.name: Oumar

texts.fr:
L’emprunteur est un homme de 58 ans qui s’appelle Oumar. C’est un retraité des chemins de fer (une grande entreprise de la place). Pour ne pas rester les bras croisés et vu son faible revenu de pension. Il a décidé de s’investir dans l’aviculture et cela depuis 2 ans. Ses prêts tournent toujours autour de cinquante milles et c’est pour le même montant qu’il  veut  renouveler son matériel d’exploitation : des abreuvoirs et des mangeoires.
Monsieur  Oumar est veuf mais père de famille. Il s’occupe de la dépense quotidienne et du bien être de ses enfants. S’il réussi à stabiliser son élevage, il pourra améliorer les conditions alimentaires de sa famille.
texts.en:
This entrepreneur is a 58-year-old man named Oumar. He is retired from the railroads (a large local company). In order to avoid sitting back and twiddling this thumbs, and given his meager pension, he decided to invest in poultry farming two years ago. 

His loans are still around 50,000 [francs], and this is the same amount he wants for renewing his operations: watering and feeding devices.

Mr. Oumar is a widower and a father with a family. He takes care of his day-to-day expenses and his children's well-being. If he succeeds in stabilizing his poultry farm, he will be able to improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy operating supplies and equipment for his chicken farm

loans.name: Paulina Esberta Levano De Loayza

texts.es:
Paulina es una mujer de 57 años, que día a día, se esfuerza por salir adelante junto a su esposo, el mismo que se dedica a la agricultura y la soldadura, mientras que él desarrolla esta labor, esta mujer microempresaria se dedica a la venta de caldo de gallina y también gaseosas diariamente, actividad que le toma todo el día, debido a que debe levantarse muy temprano para realizar la preparación de este famoso plato en la ciudad de Ica.

Paulina se dedica a esta actividad desde hace 1 año, tiempo en el que ha aprendido la cantidad de compras que debe realizar, lo que sus clientes prefieres y cuáles son las horas donde la cantidad de sus clientes se incrementa. Actualmente ella desea poder comprar un nuevo televisor para su puesto, debido a que el que tiene es muy antiguo y la definición de este no permite que sus clientes disfruten de este servicio extra, ya que constantemente se están quejando por que el sonido y la imagen que se emite son de baja calidad.

Ella sabe que con este apoyo, sus clientes podrán sentirse mucho más cómodos en el lugar donde ella vende su caldo de gallina, de esta manera podrá incrementar sus ingresos y a su vez ahorrar el dinero suficiente para incrementar la cantidad de sus productos en la bodega tan desabastecida que tiene y así podrá terminar la construcción de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Paulina is a 57 year old woman.  Day by day, she and her husband strive to get ahead.  Her husband works in agriculture and welding.  While he is engaged in this work, this woman entrepreneur works daily selling cado de gallina (chicken noodle soup) and soda.  She must get up very early as it takes all day to prepare this dish that is famous in the city of Ica.  

Paulina has been engaged in this activity for one year.  During this time, she learned about various aspects of the business: the amount of shopping she must do, the preferences of her customers, and the hours when the number of customers increases.  At this time, she wants to buy a new television for her stand because the one she has is very old and the poor definition keeps her customers from enjoying this extra service.  They are always complaining about the poor sound and picture quality.

She knows that with this help, her customers will be able to feel more comfortable at her place where she sells the caldo de gallina.  In this way, she will be able to increase her income and, in turn, save enough money to increase the quantity of products in her pantry that is currently so lacking in provisions.  She will also be able to complete construction of her home.

loans.use: to purchase a television.

loans.name: Amelita

texts.en:
Amelita is married with three children. Amelita is 41 years old and lives in the Philippines.

Amelita is a farmer and she manages a rice production farm to earn a living. She has been doing this for six years and every month she earns PHP 2,000 from this work. She has requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to purchase fertilizer for the rice crops.

Amelita became a member of GDMPC in 2012. In the future, Amelita hopes to finish her children's education.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for rice crops.

location.town: Campo 5, Ramon Magsaysay, Zamboanga Del Sur

loans.name: Wenceslao Estampa

texts.en:
Wenceslao is from Panay Daku, Clarin, Misamis Occidnetal. He is 60 years old. Wenceslao is married and has 7 adult children. To make a living, Wenceslao plants and harvests rice for sale. Wenceslao has been engaged in his business for 10 years and gets 15,000 PHP a month for these activities. In 2005, Wenceslao joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve his living situation and ability to engage in business activities. 

Wenceslao is requesting a loan of 30,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase fertilizer to boost production. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer to boost production.

loans.name: Bahati Konde

texts.en: Bahati is taking out another Kiva loan of KES 40,000 to start a charcoal business. With the loan, she wants to purchase sacks of charcoal for resale. Since the previous loan, her monthly profits increased and she has been able to provide basic needs to her family.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en: Esther is a 49-year-old married woman. She has one child. Esther operates a business of frying potatoes. She's worked in this business for 15 years. Her primary customers are passersby and women. Esther's other source of income includes retail shop business. She describes her greatest business challenge to be seasonality and her highest monthly expense is food. She rents a house that has electricity but no piped water. Esther will use the Kes 20,000 loan to pay school fees for her child. Esther aspires to establish a new stall in the future. She joined Yehu to access funds to boost her business.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her child.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is a 31-year-old married woman with three children. The oldest child is 13 years old. Marilyn is involved in fishing. Her husband is a fisherman and is the one who operates their fishing boat. Marilyn sells his catch at their town's market.

Marilyn is seeking financial support for their business. She applied for a loan from CEVI that she will use to repair their fishing boat. This loan will help re-energize Marilyn's business.

loans.use: to repair a fishing boat

loans.name: Phamela

texts.en: 18-year-old Phamela is a farmer from Trinidad, Bohol. She has a one-year-old child. Phamela primarily grows rice crops to sell. She requested a loan to purchase fertilizers and other farm inputs. Phamela hopes to achieve an abundant harvest. She is planning to set aside savings for her child's future education.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and other farm inputs

loans.name: Samba

texts.fr: Monsieur Samba  habite au Sénégal. C’est un agent de sécurité célibataire qui  évolue en meme temps dans le secteur du commerce c'est-à-dire dans la vente de tissus teintés. Il capitalise une expérience de 5 ans dans son activité qu’elle a choisie par opportunité. Elle est surtout intéressée par les retombées financières que lui procure son activité. Il est sociétaire de l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis avril 2009. Il  a déjà remboursé 6 prêts  antérieurs. Il sollicite un crédit de 200 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de tissus teintés   en vue d’ honorer  une commande de ses clients . Son objectif est de développer   son activité et accroitre ses bénéfices afin de mieux prendre en charge ses besoins personnels.
texts.en:
Mr. Samba lives in Senegal and is unmarried. He is a security guard who is simultaneously in the commercial sector, that is, the selling of dyed fabrics. He capitalizes on five years of experience in this business, which he chose by opportunity. He is particularly interested in the financial output his business provides. 

Mr. Samba has been an associate of one of the U-IMCEC branch offices since April 2009. He has already repaid six previous loans. He is requesting a loan of 200,000 francs for buying dyed cloth in order to fulfill an order from his customers. 

His goal is to develop his business and to increase his profits, so as to do better in supporting himself.

loans.use: to buy dyed cloth to fulfill an order from his customers

loans.name: Maria Milagros

texts.es:
Maria es una mujer que se considera muy honrada y luchadora, ella siempre está pendiente de su pequeño de 10 años y deseosa de que cada día se convierta en un mejor niño, lleno de sueños y fe. El esposo de María es Vigilante, esta actividad es un poco arriesgada, pero siempre se cuida mucho con el fin de volver ver a su esposa e hijo.

Como muestra de su gran esfuerzo, Maria actualmente se dedica a dos actividades con el fin de poder ganar el dinero que necesita para brindarle una buena calidad de vida a su familia. Maria es vendedora de productos de belleza, también labora brindando el servicio de limpieza para una empresa. Esta mujer de 36 años labora diariamente 8 horas, tiempo en el que solo se dedica a la realización de ventas, limpieza, cobranza y todo ese tipo de actividades.

Actualmente Maria desea poder comprar productos de belleza (Perfumes, Collares, Aretes, etc.), en considerables cantidades con la finalidad de tener los productos necesarios para la nueva festividad que se acerca, la del día de la Madre, la cual es celebrada el segundo domingo de mayo de cada año, es en este momento del año donde la cantidad de sus ventas se incrementa y es por ello que desea comprar lo necesario para agilizar sus ventas, asimismo sus clientes se sientan con muchas más posibilidades de elegir entre la variedad de productos que se les ofrece. Desde ya Maria está muy agradecida por el apoyo que se le está brindado ya que de este modo podrá incrementar sus ingresos para así poder construir su casa y brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
María is a very honorable woman and a fighter.  She is always devoted to her little 10-year-old boy, and hoping every day for him to become a better child, full of dreams and faith.  María's husband is a security guard.  This job is a little hazardous, but he is always very careful, with the goal of returning to see his wife and son.

As evidence of her great effort, María currently works two jobs with the goal of being able to earn the money she needs to give her family a good quality of life.  María sells beauty products.  She also works offering cleaning service for a company.  This 36-year-old woman works eight hours a day, during which time she works only making sales, cleaning, collecting payment, and this type of activity.

Currently María wants to be able to buy beauty products (perfume, necklaces, earrings, etc.) in large quantities with the goal of having the necessary products for the coming festivity, which is Mother's Day, celebrated the second Sunday of May each year.  This is the time of year that the quantity of her sales increases, and this is why she wants to buy what is necessary to speed up her sales.  Also, her customers have many more possibilities of choosing among the variety of products she offers them.

María is very grateful for the support she is getting because in this way she will be able to increase her income and so be able to build her house and give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy beauty products (perfume, necklaces, earrings, etc.).

loans.name: Jenny Raquel Quintanilla Martinez

texts.es:
Jenny es una mujer de 47 años que se esfuerza diariamente por progresar y convertirse en una mujer microempresaria de éxito. Ella disfruta mucho visitar a sus familiares, ya que su hijo se independizo hace algunos años y ya no lo ve tan frecuentemente como antes. 

Jenny se dedica a la venta de piscos y vinos, actividad que realiza a partir de las 9 de la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche. Jenny aprendió sobre la preparación de esta bebida gracias a sus hermanos, ella manda a fabricar esta bebida, actividad en la que ya tiene un año de experiencia y sus clientes ya son seguros.

Actualmente ella necesita el apoyo de los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a estos podrá realizar la compra 2,500 kilos de uva, ya que tiene muchísimos pedidos. Con los nuevos ingresos que obtenga gracias a su constante esfuerzo podrá realizar la compra que tanto desea, así como también cumplir su gran sueño “Darle una profesión a su hijo”
texts.en:
Jenny is a 47 year old woman who strives every day to progress and become a successful entrepreneur. She greatly enjoys visiting her relatives because her son became independent several years ago and now she doesn’t see him as frequently as she did before.

Jenny sells pisco and other wine, a job that she does beginning at 9 in the morning until 10 at night. She learned how to prepare this drink thanks to her siblings and now directs its production, a task she has had a year’s experience doing. She now has a stable customer base. 

Currently she needs the support of Kiva lenders in order to be able to purchase 2,500 kilos of grapes since she has a great many requests on order. With the new earnings obtained, thanks to her constant striving, she will be able to pay for what she most desires: “A professional career for her son”

loans.use: to purchase 2,500 kilos of grapes.

loans.name: Vidaldina Reyes Hernandez

texts.es: Vidaldina es una emprendedora que con mucho esfuerzo ha  iniciado su negocio y ha luchado por salir adelante, esta emprendedora ya ha venido trabajando con Fundación León 2000, durante el crédito que se le ha brindado la emprendedora nos expresa que ha aumentado la mercadería y sus clientes ya que siempre tiene producto para sus clientes cuando ellos necesitan. Actualmente la emprendedora está solicitando financiamiento para comprar más mercadería y abastecer a sus clientes lo cual comprara pantalones, ropa interior, camisolas, faldas, sandalia, entre otros productos que más le solicitan.
texts.en:
Vidaldina is an enterprising woman who, with great effort, has started her business.  She has struggled to get ahead.  This entrepreneur has been working with Fundción León 2000.  With the loan that she was granted she tells us that she has increased her merchandise and her customers.  This is because she always has the products for her customers when they need them.

This entrepreneur is requesting a loan to buy more merchandise to supply her customers.  She will buy pants, underwear, camisoles, skirts, and sandals, among other products that are requested the most.

loans.use: to buy pants, underwear, camisoles, skirts, and sandals, among other products that are requested the most.

loans.name: Olga Martha

texts.es:
OLGA MARTHA tiene 45 años de edad es soltera tiene dos hijos, vive con los hijos de 12 y 20 años de edad en San Miguel.

 OLGA MARTHA se dedica a dar clases en una escuela ella es maestra primaria. Solicita el crédito para comprar un TERRENO. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá mejorar la economía del hogar porque podrá alquilar terreno. 

Las compras los hará en San Miguel. El desafío al que se enfrenta es  tener casa propia. En el tiempo libre le gusta coser, leer, arreglar la casa.
texts.en:
Olga Martha is 45 years old, single and has two children. She lives with her children, who are 12 and 20 years of age, in San Miguel. 

Olga Martha earns a living teaching at a school. She is an elementary school teacher. She is requesting the loan in order to purchase some land. With the loan's help she will be able to improve her household's financial situation, because she will able to rent out the land. 

She will make purchases in San Miguel. The challenge she faces is having her own home. In her free time she likes to cook, read and do housekeeping.

loans.use: to purchase some land.

loans.name: Enebish

texts.en: Enebish is a 41 year-old man who lives with his wife and 3 children in Zuunmod, a city of Tuv province, Mongolia. His wife is unemployed and 3 kids are at secondary schools. He has been making iron products since 2008. He previously had a shop which sold electronic products. After he had trained in a course, he started the business. He has been making low pressure ovens. He makes all the details of the oven on his own and trades them. Now he needs to buy the supplies and build his workplace. Enebish is a talented person who is skilled in iron production and says that "I would like to bring the supplies in large quantities from the capital city". The total amount he is requesting is 1,400,000 MNT to purchase the iron from Ulaanbaatar.

loans.use: To purchase the iron from Ulaanbaatar

loans.name: Jesselyn

texts.en:
Jesselyn is a married woman who has six children. Jesselyn is 38 years old and resides at Mialem, Clarin, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Jesselyn raises pigs to sell to earn a living and she's been in this business for five years. Each month, she earns PHP 2,500 doing this type of business. She requested a loan of PHP 6,000 to purchase livestock feed and other supplies. 

In 2007, Jesselyn joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Jesselyn wants to make improvements to her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase livestock feed and other supplies

loans.name: Samuel Njau

texts.en:
Samuel is a married man. He has 2 children, 8 to 15 years old. He describes himself as being a focused and profit-oriented man. He operates a rental house service where he provides rental houses. He has been involved in this business for 7 years. His business is located at a strategic area, and his primary customers are local residents. He describes his biggest business challenge to be inadequate funds for improving the business.

He will use the Kes 20,000 loan to pay for the renovation of the rental houses. Samuel's dream and business goal is to own two other rental houses within 5 years.

loans.use: to pay for the renovation of the rental houses.

loans.name: Reynalda

texts.en:
Reynalda is 35 years old and is a married woman with 5 children.  Her children are between 4 and 15 years old.  Reynalda has been engaged in farming for 12 years. She primarily grows rice crops to sell. Reynalda earns about 6000 PHP per month doing this farming.

Reynalda is requesting a loan to purchase fertilizers and insecticides. She plans to use any extra income for school fees and to reinvest in her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and insecticides

loans.name: Neyla Noemi

texts.es:
Neyla Noemi tiene 47 años de edad es soltera tiene dos hijos, vive con los hijos de 21 y 15 años de edad en  San Miguel  provincia de Bolívar.

Neyla es profesora da clases en un Colegio de la zona, Solicita el crédito para mejoramiento de vivienda  va ha realizar el cambio del techo de la casa. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá  obtener  la facilidad de arreglar la casa.

Las compras de los materiales los hará en San Miguel. El sueño  es poder que los hijos culminen los estudios   y comprar una casa.

El desafío al que se enfrenta es seguir estudiando para sacar un diplomado. En el tiempo libre le gusta coser  y hacer ejercicio.
texts.en:
Neyla Noemi, age 47, is single and has two children.  She lives with her children, ages 21 and 15, in San Miguel in the Bolívar province.  Neyla is a teacher, and she teaches classes in the school in her area.

She is requesting the loan to improve her house.  She is going to change the roof of her house.  With the help from the loan she will have the opportunity to fix the house.  She will buy the materials in San Miguel.

Her dream is for her children to finish their education and to buy a house.  The challenge that she faces is to continue her education in order to get her diploma.

In her free time she likes to sew and do exercises.

loans.use: to improve her house by changing the roof.

loans.name: Mwanajuma

texts.en:
Mwanajuma is a 28-year-old single woman. She has 2 children between the ages of 2 and 7 -- 1 is enrolled in school. 

Mwanajuma operates a beauty salon business and sells her goods in a shop. She's worked in this business for 3 years. Her primary customers are women. She describes her greatest business challenge to be competition and her highest monthly expense is rent and electricity bills. She rents a house that has electricity but no piped water. 

Mwanajuma will use the Kes 20,000 loan to purchase cosmetics for her beauty salon business. Mwanajuma aspires to expand her business in the future. She joined Yehu to access funds to boost her business.

loans.use: buy cosmetics

loans.name: Fe Navarro

texts.en:
Fe is from Rstan Village, Ozamiz City. She is 49 years old.  Fe is married and has four children. 

To make a living, Fe owns and operates a swine fattening business.  She has been engaged in her business for 3 year and earns 10,000 PHP a month from these activities.  

In 2011, Fe joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Fe is requesting a new loan of 32,700 PHP, which will be used to purchase livestock feed & other supplies. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: buy livestock feed & other supplies

loans.name: Mildred Manlegro

texts.en:
Mildred is from Poblacion 4, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She is 39 years old. Mildred is married and has 3 children. 

Mildred manages a transport services business.  She has been in her business for 5 years and earns 10,000 PHP a month. In 2010, Mildred joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. 

Mildred is requesting a new loan of 35,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase spare parts and accessories. She plans to use the additional revenue generated to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: buy spare parts and accessories

loans.name: Nancy Cuaresma

texts.en:
Nancy is from the village of Lapasan, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She is 53 years old, married, and has four children. 

Nancy owns and operates a cafeteria business. She has been engaged in her business for two years and earns approximately 5,000 PHP a month from these activities. In 2007, Nancy joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. 

Nancy is requesting a new loan of 30,700 PHP, which will be used to invest in expanding her business. This loan will be her 18th loan from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business and to pay for her family's basic needs.

loans.use: invest in her cafe

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is from the village of Poblacion 3, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She is 45 years old. Gina is married and has four children. To make a living, Gina owns and operates a motorcycle transport service. Gina has been engaged in her business for over 6 years and earns approximately 5,000 PHP a month for these activities.

Gina is requesting a loan of 6,500 PHP, which will be used to pay for the cost of maintenance and repair of the motorcycle.  In 2010, Gina joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation.  She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to pay for the cost of maintenance and repair of motorcycle.

loans.name: Suzette

texts.en: Suzette is 43 years old and is a married woman with three children aged 21, 12, and 4. Suzette sells dried and salted fish to her community. She has had this business for 22 years. Suzette has requested a loan to buy more fish to process and sell. Suzette hopes for her business and income to grow, which would enable her to sustain her children's education.

loans.use: to buy more fish to process and sell

loans.name: Joemar Archua

texts.en: Joemar is married and a father of one child. Joemar is 30 years old and lives in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. Joemar is a farmer. He's been in the charcoal production business for three years. He earns PHP 8,000 monthly from this business. He has requested a loan of PHP 12,000 from GDMPC to pay the labor cost in producing charcoal. Joemar has been a member of GDMPC for two years. In the future, Joemar hopes to buy farmland.

loans.use: to pay the labor cost in producing charcoal

loans.name: Maty

texts.fr:
Maty est une jeune marchande de 30 ans, mariée. Son activité consiste à vendre des produits cosmétiques dans un marché de la place ou elle a ouvert une cantine depuis 4 ans. Elle est à son 2ème crédit à l’IMCEC ; et pour cette fois ci, elle veut doubler la somme pour augmenter son stock. Elle va acheter  des crèmes de beauté, des parfums, du savon, du lait pour le corps... 
Elle n’a  pas  de charges et les bénéfices liés à son activité lui permettront d’améliorer les conditions alimentaires de sa famille et leur confort matériel.
texts.en:
Maty is a young merchant who is 30 years old and married. Her business consists in selling cosmetics at a local market, where she opened a stall four years ago. She is on her second loan with U-IMCEC. This time, she want to double the amount to increase her inventory. She is going to buy beauty cream, perfumes, soap, body lotion… 

She has no children to support, and the profits derived from her business will enable her to improve her family's living conditions and material comfort.

loans.use: to buy cosmetic products to resell at the market

loans.name: Hugo Juan Huaman Donayre

texts.es:
Hugo es un joven emprendedor y luchador de tan solo 21 años de edad, el cual vive en la ciudad de Ica, Perú, lugar que en los últimos años ha sufrido sismos de fuerte intensidad, lluvias y amenazas de huayco, tras estos terribles acontecimientos, Hugo y sus padres han sabido salir adelante y no darse por vencidos con la finalidad de mejorar su calidad de vida constantemente. 

Hugo trabaja en un auto alquilado y brinda el servicio de transporte público, el mismo que le permite generar sus ingresos diarios, Hugo decidió hace algún tiempo unirse a una empresa de transporte iqueña y para poner formar parte de esta debe instalar un intercomunicador en el vehículo que posee, ya que con este se conectará con la central de taxis y podrá viajar a donde los clientes necesitan que los recojan. A su vez desea poder instalar un radio-parlante al automóvil que poseerá, de esa manera sus clientes disfrutarán de la música mientras viajan.
 
El está muy contento con el apoyo que se le está brindando ya que de esta manera podrá tener un trabajo seguro y sus ingresos mejorarán, con el tiempo desea ahorra una considerable cantidad de dinero con la finalidad de comprarse un carro propio y de esa manera poder incrementar mucho más ganancias para crear su propia empresa de transporte de taxis y colectivos en toda la ciudad de Ica.
texts.en:
Hugo is an enterprising and determined young man, only 21 years old, who lives in the city of Ica, Peru, a place which in recent years has suffered high-intensity earthquakes, rains, and threats of devastating flash floods. Throughout all these terrible events, Hugo and his parents have known how to get ahead and not give up, with the aim of continually improving their quality of life. 

Hugo works in an rented vehicle to provide public transport services, which allows him to earn his daily income. Hugo decided some time ago to join the transportation business in Ica and, in order to work in the industry he must install an intercom system in the vehicle he has, since this will connect him with the taxi headquarters and he will be able to travel to wherever the customers need him to pick them up. At the same time he would like to be able to install a radio system in the automobile he will have, so that his customers may enjoy music while they travel. 

He is very pleased with the support he is being given since thus he will be able to have secure employment and his income will improve. With time he hopes to save a considerable amount of money in order to purchase his own car and so be able to increase his earnings much more, in order to create his own taxi and bus service for the entire city of Ica.

loans.use: to purchase an intercom system and car radio system.

loans.name: Dama

texts.en:
Dama is a 24-year-old divorced woman. She has 5 children between the ages of 4 and 13, all 5 are enrolled in school. 

Dama operates a charcoal business and sells her goods as retail. She's worked in this business for 5 years. Her primary customers are passersby and women. She describes her greatest business challenge to be the high and low seasons and her highest monthly expense is food. She owns a house that has both electricity and piped water. 

Dama will use the Kes 20,000 loan to purchase sacks of charcoal.  Dama aspires to establish a new stall to sell charcoal in the future. She joined Yehu to access funds to boost her business.

loans.use: buy charcoal

loans.name: Emeterio Wasnon

texts.en:
Emeterio is a 71-year-old widower with 2 children from Poblacion 4, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. To earn a living, Emeterio owns and operates a service business, specifically, a motor-transport business. Emeterio has been engaged in his business for 5 years and earns 4,000 PHP per month from these activities.

In 2006, Emeterio joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services. As a result, he was able to improve his standard of living and his ability to engage in business activities. Emeterio is requesting a loan of PHP 9,100, which will be used to repair his existing vehicle. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business as a result of the loan to improve the general living conditions of his family.

loans.use: repair his vehicle

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
Nancy is from Panay Daku, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She is 43 years old, married and has five children. 

Nancy owns and operates a vegetables vending business and been in her business for 5 years. She usually gets 3,500 PHP a month.  

In 2009, Nancy joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. She is requesting a loan of 7,200 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional vegetables to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: buy vegetables

loans.name: Badamtsetseg Shagdar

texts.en:
Badamtsetseg is 45 years old. She lives with her husband, younger daughter, and granddaughter in a "ger" -- a yurt or traditional Mongolian nomadic tent, in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. 

Since 1999, Badamtsetseg has run a shoe business. She buys shoes from wholesalers who bring them from abroad, and sells them at the Narantuul, the largest outdoor market in the city. She rents two stalls at the market. Her husband, Enkhbat, helps in her business part-time and also runs a taxi and delivery business using the family car. Their goal is to accumulate enough money to build a family house in the future and to give a proper education to their children. Badamtsetseg has a two daughters. Her older daughter, a university graduate, lives separately with her husband. The younger one is a university student. 

With this loan, Badamtsetseg wanted to purchase more shoes inventory and to increase her business working capital, as she believes it is important to expand her business further.

loans.use: buy shoes and increase working capital

loans.name: Penda

texts.fr: Madame Penda est âgée  de 43 ans. Elle vit dans un des quartiers de la capitale sénégalaise. Elle s’active dans le secteur de la restauration depuis plusieurs années. Elle gère une gargote qui est située a proximité  d’une grande école  de la localité ou elle habite. En plus il y’a la cohabitation de beaucoup de sociétés de la place, ce qui fait que la cliente a choisi cette activité pour satisfaire  l’importante demande qui provient   de cette zone en matière de restauration. Sa plus grande satisfaction  au niveau de son activité c’est le fait de répondre a la  demande de la clientèle et aussi la procuration de revenus financiers. Elle est membre d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis avril 2011. Elle sollicite un crédit de 400 000 frs prévu pour l’agrandissement  de sa gargote  en vue de faire face a l’affluence de la clientèle qui devient de plus en plus importante. Son objectif est de développer son activité et  diversifier ses offres.  Ce financement lui permettra de réaliser plus de bénéfices et de pouvoir compter sur elle-même pour se prendre en charge.
texts.en:
Ms. Penda is 43 years old and lives in a district in the Senegalese capital. She has been active in the restaurant sector for several years. She manages an eatery located near a large school in the town where she lives. In addition, many local companies are found close to one another, so this client has chosen this business to satisfy an important demand for food service there. Regarding her work, she is most satisfied with being able to respond to customer demands and also to earn in income. 

She has been a member of a U-IMCEC branch office since April 2011. She is requesting a loan of 400,000 francs for expanding her eatery with the aim of coping with the influx of customers becoming more and more significant. 

Her goal is to develop her business and to diversify her offerings. This financing will enable her to make more profit and to rely on herself to earn a living.

loans.use: to expand her little eatery, where she works as a restauranteur

loans.name: Lubov

texts.ru: Любовь 61 год. Любовь 15 лет назад начала свой бизнес в животноводстве и полеводстве, ставший основным источником финансирования для ее семьи.   Начав этот бизнес с суммы в 15,000 сом (KGS), благодаря упорному труду Любовь смогла развить хозяйство с ежемесячной прибылью в сумме 5,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Любовь обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 35,000 сом (KGS) для покупки семян зерновых  и закупа горюче-смазочных материалов для посевных работ. Доходы от кредита Любовь планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего хозяйства.
texts.en: Lubov is 61 years old.  She started her own business in animal husbandry and farming 15 years ago, which has since become the main source of financing for her family.  Lubov started this business with an amount of 15,000 som (KGS), and, thanks to her hard work, she was able to grow it to have a monthly profit of 5,000 som (KGS).  In order to further develop her business, Lubov requested a loan in the amount of 35,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy cereal crop seeds and fuel for sowing work.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into a further development of her business.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fuel

loans.name: Dennis

texts.en:
Dennis is 37-years-old and lives in the Philippines.  He is married and has 4 children.  

Dennis operates a service-based business, providing transportation services to local community members to earn a living.  He has been doing this for 5 years and every month he earns PHP 2,000 from this work. 

Dennis has requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to repair his existing vehicle for better service.  He has been a member of GDMPC for a year. In the future, Dennis hopes to finish the study for his children and to double his income from his business.

loans.use: repair his vehicle

loans.name: Urcelina

texts.en:
Urcelina is 54 years old and is a married woman with 10 children aged between 11 and 35 years old.  Urcelina is a farmer from Trinidad, Bohol. She grows rice crops to sell. Urcelina's husband is also a farmer and they both work hard to sustain their family.

Urcelina has requested a loan to purchase fertilizers and pay for labor. She is hoping to achieve an abundant harvest.

loans.use: buy fertilizers and pay for labor

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
Edna is 48 years old, married and has 3 children. She is from Taguitic, Kapatagan, Lanao del Norte. 

Edna owns and operates a nipa-making business (weaving nipa palm to make roofing materials). She has been in her business for 3 years and earns 3,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) a month. In 2008, Edna joined GDMPC.  Edna is requesting a new loan of 7,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase raw materials to manufacture additional products. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: buy raw materials to make nipa palm roofing

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia is a married woman with six children. She is 39 years old and resides in Taguitic, Kapatagan, Lanao del Norte in the Philippines. 

Alicia used her last loan to pay for the cost of harvesting crabs. Her business is successful, and she's taking a new loan to purchase additional fish to sell. In the future. she hopes to be able to grow her business.

loans.use: buy fish

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice is a 28-year-old single woman. She has a daughter who is 4 years old. She describes herself to be determined. 

Alice operates a beauty saloon where she provides hair services such as plaiting, blowdrying, etc. She has been involved in this business for 5 years and employs 1 staff member. Her business is located within Nakuru town and her primary customers are ladies. She describes her biggest business challenge to be low purchasing power. 

Alice will use the Kes 35000 loan to buy a hair dryer.  Her dream and  business goal is to be the best hair dresser within 5 years.

loans.use: buy a hair dryer

loans.name: Amada

texts.en:
Amada is a 61-year-old married woman from Trinidad, Bohol. She and her husband are both farmers. Amada works hard cultivating their land and planting rice crops. Amada's harvest is used for family consumption and selling. 

Amada used to trade rice for fertilizers when she could not afford to buy fertilizers for her farm.   She will use her loan to purchase fertilizers. Amada hopes for this loan to help improve her business. She also hopes for her family's standard of living to improve.

loans.use: buy fertilizers

loans.name: Anita

texts.en: Anita is 44 years old and is a married woman with 3 children, ages 7, 12 and 13. She has been a farmer for 5 years. Anita primarily grows rice crops to sell. She earns about 3000 PHP per month doing this farming. Anita has requested a loan to purchase fertilizers and other farm inputs. She is hopeful that this loan will help improve her business.

loans.use: buy fertilizers and other farm inputs

loans.name: Izolda

texts.en:
Izolda is 49 years old. She lives in a small village in Aspindza District. Izolda is married and lives with her family: husband - Tristan and 22-year-old son. Tristan works as a shepherd in the village. Izolda’s son is a student. 

Izolda leads the agricultural business for the family.  She runs a small dairy farm with 2 milk cows.  Izolda produces on average 40 kg of cheese which she sells at the local open market. Along with the dairy farm, Izolda grows maize, haricots and potatoes on a family-owned plot of land. She sells the harvested products at the same market. The total average monthly income for the family is 1000 Laris. 

Izolda requested credit to purchase potatoes for sowing. This year she will purchase a better type of potatoes and sow them.   Izolda will work hard during the whole spring and get in summer a better harvest which will be sold at the local market. The family will get more income and Izolda will use it for financing her son’s education.

loans.use: buy potatoes

loans.name: Daouda

texts.fr:
Monsieur Daouda est un chauffeur  de taxi  depuis 20 ans. Il est marié et père de famille. Son entreprise c’est son taxi ; c’ est pourquoi il veut le réfectionner en achetant un moteur neuf  et des coussins pour  ré housser  les fauteuils de son véhicule. Il est à son premier crédit  depuis qu’il a adhéré dans la caisse.
Daouda vit en famille c’ est pourquoi ses dépenses sont minimisés. Dans l’avenir, il aimerait acquérir un autre véhicule pour améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Mr. Daouda has been a taxi driver for twenty years. He is married and a father with a family. His enterprise is his taxi: this is why he wants to refurbish it by buying a brand-new motor and some cushions for enhancing the seats in his vehicle. He is on his first loan since joining tne branch office.  

Daouda lives with his extended family. For this reason, his expenses are minimal. In the future, he would like to acquire another vehicle to improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a motor for his taxi and to enhance the seats in it

loans.name: Zoya

texts.ru:
Зое 42 года. Зоя работает заведующей  молочной фермы в селе Петровка. Работая в сфере сельского хозяйства на протяжении 10 лет, Зоя обладает знаниями и большим опытом в разведении скота.   Ежегодно молочная   ферма  в летний период года кочует в горы на пастбища,  куда переезжает и  сама Зоя вместе с работниками фермы. На сегодня в хозяйстве Зои содержится 3 головы породистых дойных коров, 15 голов овец. Продажа молока и молочных продуктов приносит около 25,000 сом в месяц (KGS). 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Зоя обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) для покупки породистой дойной коровы. Доходы от кредита Зоя планирует вложить в покупку техники  для улучшения деятельности своей фермы.
texts.en: Zoya is 42 years old.  She works as a manager of a milk farm in the Petrovka village.  Having worked in the agricultural field for ten years, Zoya has knowledge and experience in breeding livestock.  Every year, the milk farm migrates to pastures in the mountains during the summer period, where Zoya moves too with the farm's employees.  Today, Zoya's business contains 3 heads of purebred dairy cows and 15 heads of sheep.  Sales of milk and milk products yield about 25,000 som (KGS) per month.  In order to further develop her business, Zoya requested a loan in the amount of 70,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy a purebred dairy cow.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into a purchase of technology to improve her farm's functions.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Lavenie De Ferrier 2, 4 & 6 Group

texts.fr:
Belius est le coordinateur de son groupe Lavenie de Ferrier 2, 4 & 6. Il n`est pas marié et il a 4 enfants. Il habite dans la région nord d’Haiti où de l’électricité est rare et de l’eau est très limitée.

Belius a dirigé son commerce pendant les 15 années. Avant de commencer ce commerce, il vendu des produits alimentaires et boissons gaseuse. Belius voudrait utiliser cet emprunt pour investir à l`achat des charbon. Il espère que cet emprunt l’aidera à obtenir un plus grand commerce, c'est aussi l'objectif principal.
texts.en:
Belius is the coordinator of his group Lavenie de Ferrier 2, 4 & 6. He is not married and has four children. He lives in northern Haiti, where electricity is rare and water is in short supply. 

Belius has been running his business for fifteen years. Before starting this business, he sold grocery items and carbonated drinks. 

Belius would like to use this loan to invest in buying charcoal. He hopes that this loan will help him to obtain a larger business; this is also his main goal.

loans.use: to buy charcoal

loans.name: Fifamè Victorine

texts.fr: Fifamè Victorine est mariée ,âgée de 39 ans, et mère de quatre enfants. Elle commercialise des divers et  du poisson. Elle se sert de FINADEV-SA pour améliorer sa capacité d'approvisionnement et faire face aux nombreuses demandes de sa clientele.Le revenu qui en découlera l'aidera à s'occuper de ses progénitures et prendre soin d'elle-même.
texts.en: Fifamè Victorine, aged 39, is married and the mother of four children. She markets a variety of goods and fish. She is making use of FINADEV-SA to improve her capacity to restock and to cope with the numerous demands of her customers. The revenues flowing from her work will help her to take care of her offspring and to care for herself.

loans.use: to buy a box of spaghetti, a box of milk, and a basket of fish

loans.name: Rano

texts.ru: Раъно  женщина 42 лет, замужем имеет троих детей.Её бизнес, продажа подростковой одежды.Товар привозит из Истаравшана,раз в две недели.Её муж помогает ей по бизнесу а также работает по вечерам таксистом.Так как сейчас весенний сезон,на приобретенный кредит Раъно хочет привезти весенний ассортимент и расширить свой бизнес.
texts.en: Rano is a 42 year-old woman, married and has three children.  Her business is selling teenage clothing.  She brings merchandise from Istaravshan once every two weeks.  Her husband helps her with the business and also works as a taxi driver in the evenings.  Because it is currently the spring season, Rano wants to use this loan to bring in spring merchandise and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy spring merchandise and expand her business

loans.name: Yuldash

texts.ru: Юлдаш проживает в районе Пяндж. Ему 75 лет. Он женат. У него семеро детей. Он имеет среднее образование. Уже 50 лет как Юлдаш занимается растениеводством. Он берет кредит для закупа семян. Он намерен посеять хлопок и овощи.
texts.en: Yuldash lives in the Pyandj district.  He is 75 years old, married and has seven children.  He has a secondary eduction.  Yuldash has been involved in agriculture for 50 years.  He is requesting this loan to buy seeds.  He intends to sow cotton and vegetables.

loans.use: to purchase seeds

loans.name: Maria Corina

texts.es:
María Corina,  tiene 40 años de edad es casada,  tiene 3 hijos,  vive con su esposo y sus hijos  en Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar.

La VRC Arte y Cultura  “Wari” se encuentra en la comunidad de Larkaloma a 45 minutos  de la oficina, está conformada por 11 socios

María se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de papas, maíz, además a la producción de leche y queso,  tiene animales ganados.

Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, líquidos para la maleza, abonos, fungicidas. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá salvar los cultivos de papas y maíz. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en Guaranda quincenalmente. 

El sueño es poder tener un vehículo que sea propio. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es el transporte y la competencia.

En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar,  y las costumbres que más le gustan son la de la época Navideña.
texts.en: María Corina is 40 years old and is married with 3 children with whom she lives in Guaranda, in Bolívar Province.   The VRC Art and Culture "Wari" is found in the town of Larkaloma, about 45 minutes from the office, and consists of 11 members.  María makes a living in agriculture, planting potatoes and corn as well as producing milk and cheese from her herd animals.  She is requesting this loan to purchase seeds, pesticides, fertilizers and fungicides, and with it she will be able to save her potato and corn crops.  Buying and selling occurs in Guaranda every two weeks.  Her dream is to be able to own her own vehicle, because the challenges she faces are transport and competition.  In her free time she likes to rest, and the cultural traditions she enjoys the most are those that occur during Christmastime.

loans.use: tp purchase seeds, pesticides, fertilizers and fungicides.

loans.name: Evaristo Cesar Vizarreta Salazar

texts.es:
Evaristo es un hombre luchador y dedicado de 49 años de edad, el cual se dedica a brindar el servicio de transporte público desde hace 18 años, el empezó con alquilando un auto, pero con los ahorros que pudo lograr juntar compró un vehículo de segunda, el cual se fue averiando poco a poco por el uso que ya tenía y Evaristo le daba. Luego de algunos años, mucho esfuerzo, junto nuevamente dinero para poder realizar la compra de un nuevo auto, con el cual está trabajando actualmente.

Evaristo trabaja muy duro todos los días, con la finalidad de mejorar la vida de sus pequeños de 12 y 16, los cuales necesitan mucho de él y su pareja para que puedan crecer en buen estado de salud y sin que nada les haga falta.

Con el apoyo que se le está brindando, Evaristo podrá realizar la compra de algunas herramientas que son necesarias para darle el mantenimiento que necesita su vehículo, ya que con el pago de estos largos 18 años, ha aprendido como realizar algunos arreglos a su vehículo, esta compra le permitirá generar mayores ingresos para su hogar, ya que su vehículo se encontrará en mejores condiciones. También podrá realizar la compra de llantas y realizarle el mantenimiento que necesita a su motor.

El está muy agradecido por el apoyo que se le está brindando, ya que de esta manera obtendrá mejores ingresos y no estará preocupado por que el vehículo que posee sufra alguna avería en el transcurso de su labor diario. Evaristo desea que sus hijos reciban los estudios adecuados y se conviertan en grandes profesionales.
texts.en:
Evaristo is a dedicated, hard-working 49 year old man.  He has provided public transportation services for eighteen years.  He began with renting an automobile but then he was able to buy a used vehicle with the savings he accumulated. However, it was suffering from gradual wear and tear due to being used so much and Everisto gave it away.  After a few years, with much effort, he put his money together again and was able to purchase a new vehicle with which he is currently working.

Evaristo works very hard every day because his children, ages 12 and 16, need a lot from him.  His goal is to improve the lives of his partner and his children so that they can grow up healthy and have everything they need.

With the help that is being provided to him, Evaristo will be able to purchase some tools that are necessary to provide his vehicle with required maintenance.  Over these long eighteen years, he has learned how to make some repairs to his vehicle.  This purchase will allow him to generate higher income for his household because his vehicle will be in better condition.  In addition, he will be able to purchase tires and perform needed maintenance on his engine.

He is very grateful for the support that is being offered to him because he will be able to earn higher income and will not be concerned if the vehicle suffered some damage in the course of his daily work.  Evaristo wants his children to receive appropriate education and become successful professionals.

loans.use: to purchase tools, tires, and maintain his engine.

loans.name: Tabitha

texts.en:
Tabitha is a married woman. She has three children with ages ranging from 5 years to 15 years old. She describes herself to be diligent. She operates a retail store where she sells cereals and home products, such as maize, beans, peas, sugar, salt, sodas, rice, black beans, snacks, etc. She has been involved in this business for five years. Her business is located in a busy area and her primary customers are schools and local residents. In addition, she also does farming to increase her income. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds to improve the business. 

Tabitha will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy more cereals and home products. Her business goal is to run several similar retail stores within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will be a supplier of goods.

loans.use: to buy more cereals and home products for resale.

loans.name: Bonifacia

texts.en: Bonifacia, 37, is a married woman with six children. The oldest child is 14 years old. Bonifacia has been in the rice farming business for five years. She works with her husband, who is also a farmer. Bonifacia has requested a loan to purchase fertilizers for their farm. She hopes to achieve an abundant harvest. Bonifacia also hopes to elevate her family's standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase farm fertilizers.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en: Jocelyn is from Lintugop, Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur. Jocelyn is 40 years old, married, and has two children. Jocelyn owns and operates a nipa-making business (weaving nipa palm to make roofing materials). She has been in her business for three years and earns 3,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) a month. In 2011, Jocelyn joined GDMPC. Jocelyn is requesting a new loan of 5,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase raw materials to manufacture additional products. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials to manufacture additional products.

loans.name: Esterlita

texts.en: Esterlita is a married woman with two children. She is 33 years old, residing at Tinacla-an, Clarin, Misamis Occidental: Philippines. Esterlita owns and operates a farm, planting and harvesting bananas for sale to earn a living. She's been ten years in this business. Each month, she earns 3,000 PHP doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 4,505 PHP to purchase fertilizers, such as manure. In 2010, Pervelita became a member of GDMPC. In the future, Esterlita wants to have a motorcycle and to finish the studies of her children.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, such as manure.

loans.name: Domingo

texts.en: Domingo is 31 years old and lives in Aurora, Zamboanga Del Sur, Philippines. He is married with three school-aged children. Domingo used his last loan to purchase additional inventory. His business has grown and become successful. Now he is obtaining a new loan to purchase more videoke electronics in order to expand his services. Positively, he hopes to be able to grow his business more.

loans.use: to purchase more videoke electronics in order to expand his services.

loans.name: Dieynaba

texts.fr:
Madame Dieynaba est une brave femme qui fait parti des 1ère clientes de l’institution, ou elle a eu à bénéficier de plusieurs crédits. Elle est âgée de 50 ans, mariée et mère de famille. Elle fait du commerce depuis plus de 10 ans et s’active dans un peu de tout aussi. Avec ce crédit, elle va acheter  20 sacs de jujube, et des oranges.
Elle participe à la dépense quotidienne du foyer  et travaille à améliorer les conditions  de vie.
texts.en:
Mrs. Dieynaba is a brave woman who was among the first members of the microfinance institution, where she received several loans. She is 50 years old and married with children. She has been a merchant for over 10 years and does a little bit of everything. 

She will use this loan to buy 20 bags of jujube (a type of date) and some oranges. She contributes to the household’s daily expenses and strives to improve the family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy seasonal fruit such as oranges and jujube for resale.

loans.name: Rajabgul

texts.ru: Рачабгул жительница района Пяндж. Ей 48 лет. Она замужем. У нее четверо детей. Рачабгул занимается посевом сельскохозяйственных культур. Этим видом деятельности она занимается 25 лет. Кредит берет для закупа минеральных удобрений и семян картошки.
texts.en: Rajabgul is a resident of the Pyandj district.  She is 48 years old, married and has four children.  Rajabgul is involved in sowing agricultural crops.  She has been in this business for 25 years.  She is requesting this loan to buy mineral fertilizers and potato seeds.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers and potato seeds

loans.name: Leonardo Pérez Caballero

texts.es:
E señor Leonardo, originario de la ciudad de león, casado con 4 hijos los cuales son menores de edad y dependen de el en su totalidad, su negocio inicio con ventas ambulante con un capital de trabajo con C$ 500.00 córdobas los cuales eran productos de préstamos. Inicia su jornada laboral a las 6:00 am comprando al por mayor todo tipo de verduras y frutas de la temporada el cual posteriormente trasladarse a su negocio y ofrecerlas a sus clientela.

El señor Leonardo utilizará el crédito que le ha brindado CEPRODEL para la compra al por mayor de los productos tales como son: papas, plátanos, cebollas, naranjas, zanahorias, chayote, etc.

El señor Leonardo está sumamente agradecido con CEPRODEL por los créditos brindados hacia su persona los cuales han sido una bendición logrando mejorar sus ingresos y aumentar su capital de trabajo el cual le ha permitido mejorar la calidad de vida para toda su familia
texts.en:
Leonardo, a native of the city of Leon, is married and has four minor children who depend on him totally.  His business started through street sales with an investment of about 500 cordobas, which he got from loans.  He begins his workday at 6:00 am buying all types of wholesale seasonal vegetables and fruits that he later transports to his business to offer to his customers.  

Leonardo will use his loan from CEPRODEL to buy more products such as potatoes, bananas, onions, oranges, carrots, chayote, etc.  

Leonardo is very grateful to CEPRODEL for the loans he has been given.  They have been a blessing in helping him improve his income and increase his capital.  This has permitted him to improve the quality of life for his whole family.

loans.use: to buy potatoes, bananas, onions, oranges, carrots, chayote, etc.

loans.name: Tupak Amawta

texts.es:
Tupak Amawta Chacha Gauquipana  tiene 34 años de edad es soltero,  tiene 1 hija, viven los dos,  en Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar.

La VRC Arte y Cultura  “Wari” se encuentra en la comunidad de Larkaloma a 45 minutos  de la oficina, está conformada por 11 socios

Tupak se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de papas, maíz, además cría animales como  pollos.

Solicita el crédito para comprar abonos, fertilizantes, líquidos,  abonos orgánicos. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá fumigar a tiempo los cultivos. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en  Guaranda cada 15 días.

El sueño es poder tener un vehículo propio. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es la competencia.

En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar.
texts.en: Tupak Amawta Chacha Gauquipana is 34 years old and is a single father of one little girl, with whom he lives in Guaranda, in the Bolívar Province.  The VRC Art and Culture "Wari" is found in the town of Larkaloma about 45 minutes from the office, and consists of 11 members.  Tupak makes a living in agriculture planting potatoes and corn as well as raising chickens.  He is requesting this loan in order to purchase manure, liquid fertilizers and other organic fertilizers, with which he will be able to fumigate in time for planting season.  Buying and selling occurs in Guaranda every two weeks.  His dream is to be able to own his own vehicle, and the biggest challenge that he faces is competition.  In his free time he likes to rest from work.

loans.use:
para comprar abonos, fertilizantes, líquidos,  abonos orgánicos
to purchase manure, liquid fertilizer and other organic fertilizers.

loans.name: Augusto Wilfrido Chavez Rodriguez

texts.es:
AUGUSTO WILFRIDO, tiene 48 años,  de estado civil soltero,  reside en  Montalvo, provincia de Los Ríos, tiene seis  hijos  y vive cuatro de ellos, de 17, 12 , 9 y 7 años.

La VRC  San Joaquín  se   encuentra a 15  minutos  de la oficina Montalvo, está conformada por 12 socios.

 AUGUSTO WILFRIDO se dedica  a la agricultura  especialmente al  cultivo de productos de ciclo corto, produce arroz y soya.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas, Insumos, urea, lìquidos para la maleza para la producción  y así poder mejorar los cultivos. Las compras las realiza de forma semanal en Montalvo.

Su sueño es  comprar un terreno propio  y así  cultivar los productos propios de la zona, los desafíos a los que se enfrenta  es la inclemencia del tiempo sobre toda la sequía.

Su tiempo libre lo dedica al deporte
texts.en:
Augusto Wilfrido is 48 years old, single and living in Montalvo, Los Ríos Province.  He has six children and lives with four of them who are 17, 12, 9 and 7 years old.

The “San Joaquín” communal bank is fifteen minutes from the Montalvo office and has 12 members.

Augusto Wilfrido is a farmer especially of short cycle rice and soya.  He’s asking for the loan to buy seeds, supplies, urea and weed killing liquids to improve crops.  His purchases take place in Montalvo weekly.

His dream is to buy a piece of land of his own to grow products that are common to the area.  The challenges he faces are inclement weather, especially draught.

He dedicates his free time to sports.

loans.use: to buy seeds, supplies, urea, and weed killers.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en: Lucy is a widow with three children, ages 10 to 14 years old. She describes herself to be determined and loves the business. She operates a retail store where she sells charcoal. She has been involved in this business for four years. Her business is located within a busy market and her primary customers are local residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds for improving the business. She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy more charcoal for resale. Her business goal is to be a wholesaler within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will be supplying charcoal to her customers.

loans.use: to buy more charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Jumwa

texts.en:
Jumwa is a widowed woman. She has eight children and one is enrolled in school. Jumwa operates a charcoal selling business and sells her goods from home. She's worked in this business for ten years. Her primary customers are neighbors and passersby. She describes her greatest business challenge to be high cost of transportation, and her highest monthly expense is food for her family. She owns a house that has piped water but no electricity. 

Jumwa will use the Kes 50,000 loan to purchase sacks of charcoal for resale. Jumwa aspires to expand her business in the future. She joined Yehu to access funds to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en:
Victoria is a single woman. She has one child. Victoria owns a kindergarten school. She's worked in this business for three years. Her primary customers are parents who have school going children. She describes her greatest business challenge to be seasonality, and her highest monthly expense is food for her family. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

Victoria will use the Kes 10,000 loan to purchase teaching materials and chairs. Victoria aspires to expand her business in the future. She joined Yehu to access funds to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase teaching materials and chairs.

loans.name: Mila Tano

texts.en:
Mila is from Ramon Magsaysay, Zamboanga del Sur. She is 51 years old. Mila is married and has two children. 

To make a living, Mila owns and operates a business, serving a variety of different meals to customers in the local community. Mila has been engaged in her business for three years and earns approximately 7,300 PHP a month for these activities.

Mila is requesting a loan of 15,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase food and drinks. In 2009, Mila joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase food and drinks.

loans.name: Davaasuren

texts.en: Mr. Davaasuren, 29, is a craftsman and makes many kinds of traditional souvenirs and some appliances in his home. Then he sells them to the market sellers at a low price. He lives with his girlfriend in a ger, a Mongolian traditional nomadic tent, which is in the suburban district of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been running his business since 2009 with his brother, and has gained quite a lot of experience in his business. At this time, he wants to increase his inventory and business working capital. He believes that it will increase his business outputs and income in the future. The loan he is taking will be dedicated to purchasing the raw materials for his craft business.

loans.use: to purchase the raw materials for his craft business.

loans.name: Khady Gning

texts.fr:
Madame Khady Gning est une dame de 63 ans qui s’active dans le commerce de produits cosmétiques et divers et  cela depuis 2 ans .Elle est marié et responsable de famille.
Avec le crédit, elle va acheter  du parfum, des poudres pour bébé des crèmes, du lait pour le corps, du beurre de karité...
Elle n’a pas de charges mais les bénéfices lui permettent de pouvoir diversifier les produits et services et d’améliorer les conditions de vie.
texts.en:
Khady Gning is a 63-year-old woman.  For the past two years she has been actively involved in the sale of cosmetic products and other goods.  She is married and has a family.
With her loan she will buy some perfume, baby powder, creams, body lotions, shea butter etc.
She has no expenses, and her profits will allow her to diversify her products and services and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy cosmetic products for resale.

loans.name: Howadé Christine's Group

texts.fr: Howadé Christine  est mariée et mère ,âgée de 33 ans, de cinq enfants. Elle dispose d'un étalage de vente de vivres et d'huile . Elle a nécessité  un financement auprès de Finadev en vue d'acquérir une grande part de marché ce qui lui permettra d'être au petit soin à ses proches. La responsable est celle qui se retrouve à droite de la photo.
texts.en:
Howadé Christine, age 33, is married and a mother to five children. She has a booth where she sells food and oil. 

She is seeking a loan from Finadev with a view to gaining a large share of the market, which will allow her to look after her family. 

The person in charge of the group is seen in the right-hand side photo.

loans.use: to buy one bag of rice, one bag of maize, one bag of beans, and 10L of palm oil.

loans.name: María Eugenia Araujo

texts.es:
La señora María Eugenia, inicia sus actividades a las 6 de la mañana en el  punto ofertando lo que es gaseosas, jugos, Agua Helada ofertándolo a todos los clientes que abordan los autobuses que van a las distintas comunidades finalizando sus labores a las 5 de la tarde. Su puesto está ubicado en el mercado Terminal de Buses de León donde realiza esta actividad para la mantención de su Familia que tanto quiere. 
El crédito será utilizado para la compra de productos de mayor calidad tales como: Gaseosas, Caramelos, Chicles, Jugos y así poder satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes logrando incrementar sus ventas que le ayudaran a mejorar su calidad de vida.
